A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to like it. I wanted to love it\, but . . . . This movie is simply high budget garbage. Illogical plot\, out of character decisions\, no homage paid to the previous films\, previously complicated and conflicted characters turned into one dimensional objects to be run over by a childish writer. If Rogue One had not been so good\, I might have given up on the franchise after seeing this piece of junk. The prequels were better
